      @RequestMapping(method=POST, value="/pig-latin", produces={"application/json","application/xml"}, consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}) default org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TranslationResponse> translate(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid TranslationRequest translationRequest)
      POST /pig-latin : Translate text to Pig Latin Translate English text to Pig Latin following the rules described in the [description](#/info/description).
      Parameters:
      translationRequest - (required)
      Returns:
      English sentence successfully translated into Pig Latin. (status code 200) or The request body is invalid. The response body contains the error message. (status code 400)
